page.title: 09SHOPPING IN OUR D-BLOCK
page.content: The children in our class have been out doing a survey of the shops in our D-Block. We walked all the way along Newchurch Road through Stacksteads doing a tally of the different types of shops. Nearly all of the shops in Stacksteads are along the main road and they are all quite small shops. They are mostly food shops and there are a few clothing shops and others which sell everyday essentials. If people want to do alot of shopping or go to large stores or supermarkets they go to Burnley or one of the big towns. Bacup is very similar but with a bit more choice and there is a small supermarket. There is also Woolworths, but this is closing down soon. Bacup has a poor image and finds it difficult to attract people and the shops do not do very well.
